statements.query: MATCH (n:AWSLambdaFunctionAlias)<-[:KNOWN_AS]-(:AWSLambda)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSLambdaFunctionAlias)<-[r:KNOWN_AS]-(:AWSLambda)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (n:AWSLambdaEventSourceMapping)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSLambda)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSLambdaEventSourceMapping)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:AWSLambda)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (n:AWSLambdaLayer)<-[:HAS]-(:AWSLambda)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSLambdaLayer)<-[r:HAS]-(:AWSLambda)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSLambda)-[r:STS_ASSUME_ROLE_ALLOW]->(:AWSPrincipal) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE r
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:AWSLambda) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[r:RESOURCE]->(:AWSLambda) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
